tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE building_permits (
    permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_address VARCHAR(255),
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100),
    permit_type VARCHAR(50),
    issue_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE building_permits (
    permit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name TEXT,
    permit_type TEXT,
    permit_status TEXT,
    land_use_compliance BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE BuildingPermits (
    permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    permit_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    permit_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PermitApprovals (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_id INT NOT NULL,
    approval_date DATE,
    approval_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    approval_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE building_permits (
    permit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name TEXT,
    permit_type TEXT,
    permit_status TEXT,
    date_issued DATE
);

CREATE TABLE permit_applications (
    application_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_id UUID,
    regulation_id UUID,
    owner_id UUID,
    application_date DATE,
    application_status TEXT
);
